actions.name: Gluttony
actions.description: Effect: The user can equip two additional [Food] items as Belt items, and can consume equipped [Food] items as a Free Action while they meet the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.

system.description: Effect: The user can equip two additional [Food] items as Belt items, and can consume equipped [Food] items as a Free Action while they meet the [Desperation 1/2] Condition.
